one_reviews_text: Loads up and see the controllers, but can't do anything else.
review_feedback: We'd like to help diagnose this but we need a bit more info. If you can hop on over to our Discord, we'll try and help: https://discord.com/invite/W7NCEYnEfy

review_title: Great for a free program but...
one_reviews_text: There's no autosave or file-recovery feature. As such I've lost hours of work (on more than one occasion!) because it crashed and - I guess like an idiot - I forgot to periodically save my creations. I mean it's great that I was so engrossed into the immersive creative process forgetting I was interacting with a piece of software that the idea of breaking my flow to save never entered my head. Other than that, it's great - especially for something free. But I'm feeling rather salty about jumping back into it after basically wasting the last 2 hours of creativity ><
review_feedback: Sorry for the late response. There is an autosave feature; see https://docs.openbrush.app/user-guide/accessing-autosave-files for more details. If it's not working, we'd love to hear about it on our discord; https://discord.com/invite/W7NCEYnEfy

one_reviews_text:
It's super easy to use and learn. Only took me a few minutes to figure out how create a wooden textured table. However I do wish there was a more precise eraser tool for more detailed work.
   
       I like using the diamond tool to create shapes and guides then drawing around it to create what i want. I was not fond of the guide tool provided in the advanced mode. The advanced mode guide tool disapears within as you draw making it frustrating to use.  The grey color of the tool almost blends in with the environment making it harder to see.

         These issues make it a 4 star for me. I'll redo the review if i figure out a way around these or it is updated.

Little Dissapointed that the name has changed but the content is the same copy paste which tilt brush has realeased they developers must add some extra features which r in gravity sketch and what if they would be able to add masterpeice motion vr kind of features like  rigging a character and animate them but at last it is fast liked camera animation, fly features.
review_feedback: For a current list of changes from Tilt Brush, you can see https://docs.openbrush.app/differences-between-open-brush-and-tilt-brush . We have more features coming - fairly soon hopefully! Check out the experimental builds for a preview of what we're working on: https://docs.openbrush.app/alternate-and-experimental-builds
